## MPStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an MP Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MPStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeMP: T;
    unstakeMP?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeMP?: undefined;
    unstakeMP: T;
    unstakeAllMP: boolean;
};
```
